stock indicators REST API
Transform price quotes into trade indicators and market insights.
Nothing more.
View on GitHub

Stock Indicators API

Stock Indicators API is a REST API built with .NET that produces financial market technical indicators. Send in historical price quotes and get back desired indicators such as moving averages, Relative Strength Index, Stochastic Oscillator, Parabolic SAR, etc. Nothing more.

It can be used in any market analysis software using standard OHLCV price quotes for equities, commodities, forex, cryptocurrencies, and others. We had private technical analysis, trading algorithms, machine learning, and charting systems in mind when originally creating this library. Stock Indicators for .NET is also available.

Explore more information:

  • Demo site (a stock chart)
